documentation.text:
@dev Interface of the StarShip
StarShip will be implemented as an NFT contract.

@dev query a ship is whether a basic ship
@return true if it's a basic ship,false if it's a advanced ship

@dev Interface of the StarShip
StarShip will be implemented as an NFT contract.

@dev query a ship is whether a basic ship
@return true if it's a basic ship,false if it's a advanced ship

devdoc.details: Interface of the StarShip StarShip will be implemented as an NFT contract.

isBasicShip(uint256).details: query a ship is whether a basic ship

returns._0: true if it's a basic ship,false if it's a advanced ship

an uint256[] contains all starships belongs to the user . the even number position is corresponding id, the odd number position  is the starship data example [0,35546,1,27513654,6,355455] mean there are starships  [{id:0,data:35546},{id:1,data:27513654},{id:6,data:355455}] the data parser will be provided in another js script or use the nft tokeUri to get the information
